preference.name: DIS_reconcile_model_view_proxies_batch_size
preference.preference_description: Defines the batch size of Model Views to reconcile in a Model View Palette for all Teamcenter Disclosure "Reconcile" operations. The reconciliation operations reconciles the Model Views in the given Model View Palette in batches, with the batch size defined by this preference. A value of -1 indicates that there is no maximum batch size and that all Model Views in the Model View Palette will be reconciled in one batch. The default value is 20. This is a user preference.
